Comment: Regarding your statement supporting tariffs on drugs, see link to World Trade Organization agreement on tariffs -- which the USA signed. Import sales taxes on drugs raise prices and reduce availability for those in need. Pharmaceuticals should not be tariffed. Worse, the Inflation Reduction Act penalizes drug manufacturers who raise their prices in excess of inflation. The penalty is in the form of additional rebates to Medicare. I am certain that manufacturers of low-margin generics will discontinue many products if Trump establishes import sales tax for drugs as he said he would. Of course, Trump's word is worth nothing.
